page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JESSICA
page.content: Jessica wakes at 7,dresses and breakfasts on cornflakes and toast with a cup of tea. She washes herself and cleans her teeth then brushes her hair. When she is ready her Mum drives her to her Nanny's where she plays with Prince, the dog. At 8.45 her Nanny drives her to school for 9 o'clock. On arrival she goes straight to her classroom to see her friends. After registration she goes to school assembly to hear a story or see a play Later, back in the classroom she does her work_Maths,English,Topic,R.E., Science,Cooking,Sewing,Art,Games,P.E. Handwriting,Music or sees a T.V. prog. At 12 o'clock it is lunch she eats her packed lunch in the school hall. Then it's play on the playground or field until 1.10p.m. Then the handbell is rung for the resumption of lessons.At 3.15 she goes home to play and bed.
